columns.name: CveId
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to the security vulnerability under the Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) system

columns.name: CvssScore
columns.description: Severity score assigned to the security vulnerability under the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)

columns.name: IsExploitAvailable
columns.description: Indicates whether exploit code for the vulnerability is publicly available

columns.name: VulnerabilitySeverityLevel
columns.description: Severity level assigned to the security vulnerability based on the CVSS score and dynamic factors influenced by the threat landscape

columns.name: LastModifiedTime
columns.description: Date and time the item or related metadata was last modified

columns.name: PublishedDate
columns.description: Date vulnerability was disclosed to the public

columns.name: VulnerabilityDescription
columns.description: Description of the vulnerability and associated risks

columns.name: AffectedSoftware
columns.description: List of all software products affected by the vulnerability
